sense.gloss: last train (bus, flight, etc.; of the day)
to end, to come to an end, to close, to finish
doing something from beginning to end, being unchanged from beginning to end
from beginning to end, the whole time, throughout, consistently
end of war, cessation of hostilities
in the end, after all, never (happened)

sdata.j: これで↑休暇↑↓きゅうか↓は↑終↑↓お↓わった。
↑私↑↓わたし↓たちはもう↑終↑↓お↓わったわ。↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を↑返↑↓かえ↓して！
sdata.e: It's over between us. Give me back my ring!

sdata.j: ↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑犯↑↓はん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑終身↑↓しゅうしん↓↑刑↑↓けい↓に↑処↑↓しょ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑正午↑↓しょうご↓までにこの↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑終↑↓お↓わらせねばならない。
sdata.e: You have to get this work finished by noon.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもっと↑前↑↓まえ↓にそれを↑終↑↓お↓わらせておくべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have completed it long ago.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓を↑終↑↓お↓えたのか。
sdata.e: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓をし↑終↑↓お↓えたのですか。
sdata.e: Have you finished doing your homework yet?

sdata.j: ↑宿題↑↓しゅくだい↓はもう↑終↑↓お↓わったのですか。
sdata.e: Have you done all your homework?
